text:
<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Elevated Error Rates>
We are investigating increased error rates for the AWS Management Console in the US-GOV-WEST-1 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased Error Rates>
We are investigating increased error rates for the AWS Management Console in the US-GOV-WEST-1 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Increased Error Rates>
Between 2:11 PM and 3:41 PM PST we experienced increased error rates for the AWS Management Console in the US-GOV-WEST-1 Region. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service degradation: Increased Error Rates>
We are investigating increased error rates on the KMS CreateKey API in the SA-EAST-1 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service degradation: Increased Error Rates>
We have identified the root cause for the increased error rates on the KMS CreateKey API in the SA-EAST-1 Region and continue to work towards resolution.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Increased Error Rates>
Between 6:23 PM and 8:03 PM PST, we experienced increased error rates on the KMS CreateKey API in the SA-EAST-1 Region. This issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.
